name: Blue Hunt
description:
Explore the mysterious and never touched before forest of Artarama with the daring adventurer Finn! Led by his greedy desire for the title of treasure master, Finn, ventures into the forest of Artarama to hunt down the five long lost treasures of Artarama. 

Blue Hunt is a traditional 2D pixel platform game. As the player progresses through level the game will get harder and harder. Are you up for the challenge of joining Finn on his conquest for the long lost five treasures?
